cab.content: WAR CABINET.FUTURE OF THE COAL-MINING INDUSTRY.Note by the Deputy Prime Minister.IT is important that during the next few months the production of coal shallnot be impeded by controversy about the future of the ooal-mining industry.There is evidence that even general and indirect references to this subject by ministers encourage the Press to embarrassing speculations. I should be grateful,therefore, if my colleagues would bear this point in mind in framing theirspeeches and in particular avoid any reference to the Foot Report without prior consulation with the Minister of Fuel and Power.C. R. A.Great George Street, S.W. 1,5th February, 1945.[29178]THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT \jfPrinted for the War Cabinet. February 1945.
